title: 1.2 What is the Bible?
itunes:title: What is the Bible?
description: The Jews, Catholics, Protestants, Orthodox, and Church of the East all have different versions of the Bible, with dissimilar books, based on different ancient texts. I explain why. For a handy summary chart, check out my chart Canons of the Old Testament at www.historyinthebible.com.
content:encoded: The Jews, Catholics, Protestants, Orthodox, and Church of the East all have different versions of the Bible, with dissimilar books, based on different ancient texts. I explain why. For a handy summary chart, check out my chart Canons of the Old Testament at www.historyinthebible.com.
itunes:subtitle: Keynote ep: The different canons of the Bible: Jewish, Catholic, Protestant, Orthodox, Eastern
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
